tool_description: Creates reusable UI component specifications for mobile apps, defining buttons, inputs, cards, and other interface elements with consistent styling.

component_types.description: Types of components to create (button, input, card, modal, tab, etc.)

design_system.description: Base design system: material, ios, carbon, ant, or custom

color_palette.description: Color palette in hex format for component styling

spacing_unit.description: Base spacing unit in pixels (4, 8, or 16)

component_states.description: Component states to include (default, hover, active, disabled, loading)

error_messages: Invalid component types: Use recognized component names (button, input, card, modal, tab, etc.)
Invalid design system: Use material, ios, carbon, ant, or custom
Invalid color format: Provide colors in hex format (e.g., #FF5722)
Invalid border radius: Value must be between 0 and 20 pixels
Invalid spacing unit: Use 4, 8, or 16 pixels
Invalid animation duration: Value must be between 100 and 1000 milliseconds
Invalid component states: Use default, hover, active, disabled, or loading
usage: Specify component_types, design_system, and color_palette; optionally configure styling parameters to generate a comprehensive component library specification.
